content:
Beto O’Rourke becomes the latest declared candidate in a wide-open primary race

of their divisions over policies like the Green New Deal and support for Israel, Democrats are united in their opposition to President Donald Trump. In the most recent polling from Monmouth University, a majority of voters said their most important concern was defeating him next year, whereas positions on policy came second. In these early days of the Democrats’ process for nominating a challenger, they certainly have no shortage of options.

There already seems to be a Democrat for everyone in 2020, and not all of the likely candidates have declared. But according to

’s analysis of polling in party nominations between 1980 and 2016, this early in a cycle just 17% of polls released have correctly identified the eventual party nominee. In February 2007, for example, Hillary Clinton had a 20-point lead over a young Barack Obama, who would end up winning the nomination a year and a half later in one of the closest primaries in recent memory. On the Republican side, Donald Trump had not even announced his candidacy 72 weeks before his party’s convention in 2016.

There are other ways to gauge who is ahead. Betting markets provide an opportunity for prognosticators to put real money behind their arguments, and performed admirably in predicting the 2018 midterms. According to the latest numbers from PredictIt, a popular American market, Kamala Harris has opened up a meaningful lead against all of the other currently announced candidates. However, with Joe Biden, the former Vice President, and Beto O’Rourke, who did surprisingly well in his Texas Senate race last year, not far behind, her position may deteriorate if they actually declare. In the game of presidential primaries, it is simply too early to say who might hold the winning cards.

Picture credits: AP; EPA; Reuters

eg2: They pledged to fight for  rights.
他们誓为争取民主权利而斗争。
Martin Luther King was seen as a hero of Democratic movement.
马丁路德金被认为是民主运动的英雄。
The party has threatened to boycott the election because it believes it will not be .
该党威胁要抵制选举，因它认为这次选举将不会是民主的。

ex: abbr. 环境保护局（Environmental Protection Agency）

wp.USA EPA: 美国环保署;美国环境保护局

wp.EPA LOGO: 图像文件;就是开机自检时显示在屏幕上方的标志

ex: n. (Harri)人名；(法)阿里；(芬)哈里
n. (Rourke)人名；(英)鲁尔克
n. 参议院（美国、澳大利亚、加拿大、法国等国家的两个立法机构之一；美国许多州议会也设有参议院）
网络 上院；元老院；美国参议院
eg2: a member of the Senate
参议员
a Senate committee
参议院委员会
the senate of Loughborough University
拉夫伯勒大学评议会

ex: n. 【地】得克萨斯州(美国西南部的一州)
网络 德克萨斯州；德州；美国德州
adv. 美好地，极好地；令人钦佩地
eg2: Because of the decentralization of power, however, the United States admirably fulfills the gold standard of pluralist democracy, which assumes multiple centers of power.
然而，由于权力分散，美国非常好地满足了应有多个权力中心的多元主义民主政治的黄金标准。
"We're very aware of what's going on in the world but we have to trade that off with being fair to our people who, we believe, have performed admirably throughout this crisis, " said Viniar.
“我们非常清楚这个世界正在发生什么，但是为了公正对待我们的员工，我们必须把那些事情放在一边；我们相信，员工们在危机中的表现令人钦佩。” 温尼亚尔说。
If one ambition of journalism is to help us understand and imagine places we have not seen, both of these fulfill that role .
新闻工作追求的是帮助人们理解和猜象我们不能看见的地方，两方面都巧妙地担当了这一角色。

wp.Green Candidacy: 左翼运动绿色竞选组织

ex: n. 候选资格；候选状态

wp.Closest Point: 最近点;约束;相近点约束
wp.closest friend: 最亲近的朋友;最亲密的朋友

ex: adj. 最靠近的（close的最高级）
eg2: Maybe that’s why we save those for the ones  to us, like our families.
也许这就是为什么我们保存那些与我们最亲近的东西，例如家庭。
A. Some of my closest friends in the world are still doing this work — not just in Chicago but elsewhere.
这个世界上一些我最要好的朋友还在做这样的工作——不仅仅是在芝加哥，世界各地都有。
To varyingdegrees, we all have secrets which we do not want evenour  friends to learn, but few of us have skeletons in the cupboard.
我们在不同程度上艘有一些甚至连最亲密的朋友也不想让他们知道的秘密，但是却极少有人有橱中骷髅。

wp.Games Convention: 莱比锡游戏展;游戏大会;德国莱比锡电玩展览会;游戏博览会
wp.convention priority: 公约优先权;条约优先权

wp.Calling Convention: 调用约定;呼叫惯例;调用协定;调用规范
wp.sign convention: 符号规约;符号法则;符号的规定;符号规定
wp.Annapolis Convention: 安纳波利斯会议;年安纳波利斯大会;历史上的今天安那波利斯大会

ex: n. 大会；[法] 惯例；[计] 约定；[法] 协定；习俗
eg2: Originality often triumphs over .
创新常常战胜惯例。
He sets at naught every convention of society.
他轻视所有的社会习俗。
The party convention drafted the president for a second term.
该党大会决定由总统竞选连任。

ex: vi. 恶化，变坏
vt. 恶化
eg2: Her findings have helped to transform conventional ideas about how the brain starts to deteriorate once we reach our teenage years.
她的发现有助于转变我们通常的观念——一旦渡过青少年时期之后，我们的大脑便开始走向恶化。
“The goal is to do a scan on someone before they get the disease and be able to tell if they’re at higher risk or starting to , ” she said.
“我们的目标是在某人患上老年痴呆病之前， 对他的脑部进行扫描，从而预先告知他们是否处于较高疾病风险或情况开始恶化，”她说。
We know that a form of selection occurs within our brains as we develop and learn - synaptic connections and pathways that work well are reinforced, whereas weak ones .
我们知道，人在发育和学习期间大脑里面发生一种形式的选择——那些运转正常的突触链接和路径得到加强，而弱者恶化。

ex: adj. 最后的，结果的；可能的；终于的

wp.eventual consistency: 最终一致性;最终一致;一致性

eg2: What does all this mean for eventual control of the stricken reactor as well as the cleanup?
所有的这些对最终控制瘫痪的反应堆和清除核废物意味着什么？
Combined with reduced blood flow, neuropathy in the feet increases the chance of foot ulcers and  limb amputation.
足部神经病与血流量减少结合在一起，增加了患足部溃疡的可能，最终导致截肢。

wp.Midterm election: 中期选举;期中选举;中期推举
wp.Midterm examination: 期中考试;期中考;期中随堂考试

ex: adj. 期中的；中间的
n. 期中考试
eg2: PROF: Yes This is the indirect method but on the  it was the direct method STUDENT: But I am saying maintaining the order is important right?
教授：是的,这是间接法,但是关于期中考试,那是直接法,学生：但是我说,保持顺序很重要,对不对？
The war in Iraq was a predominant issue in the 2006 midterm elections, and Newport said it appears that it will continue to be the dominant issue during the next year.
在2006年的中期选举期间，伊拉克战争是占主导地位的问题。 纽波特说，看来这个问题在明年的选举中将继续成为压倒一切的问题。
The politically good news for Obama is that no matter what the outcome of the midterm elections, everything changes in January.
任何事情都将在一月份改变，不论中期选举是什么结果，这对奥巴马来说都是利好的消息。

ex: vt. 推荐；提名；任命；指定

wp.executor nominate: 遗嘱指定的遗嘱执行人;翻译;遗嘱执行人

eg2: However, you can nominate an execution group for the handling of content-based filtering requests.
不过，您可以指定一个执行组来处理基于内容的过滤请求。
First, you can nominate your own object of today: something that represents human ingenuity and the challenges facing humanity in 2010.
第一，你可以提名一个当代的物品：2010年的物品中能够代表人类智慧和人类面临的挑战的。
Then,  one lead project manager and one lead architect from each application area to represent that area at the project level.
在任何应用领域，任命一个项目经理和一个构架师都代表着该领域在项目上的水平。

wp.nomination process: 提名程序;提名过程;提名方式

ex: n. 任命，提名；提名权
eg2: This is her first Oscar .
这是她的首次奥斯卡提名。
He instructed his staff to crank up for an all-out fight against the .
他指示手下工作人员做好准备，全力以赴反对这项提名。
She was nominated for an appeals court judgeship in 1999. But the Senate never voted on her .
虽然她在1999年被提名为上诉法院法官，但是参议院从未就她的提名投票。

wp.common nominee: 共用代理人;共享代理人

ex: n. 被任命者；被提名的人；代名人
eg2: I think the president will ask any  to discuss how they view the Constitution and the legal principles enshrined in it.
我认为总统将会和所有的被提名人讨论他们如何看待宪法和已载入的法律原则。
The president did not formally endorse McCain, but did say he was willing to campaign on behalf of the eventual Republican .
布什总统没有正式表态支持麦凯恩，但是他说，他愿意为最后将赢得共和党提名的侯选人竞选。
This process can be contentious, especially in cases in which committee members are trying to gauge a ’s views on a controversial issue.
这一过程可能会有争议，特别是在国会相关委员会成员想在有争议问题上判断被提名人的观点的情况下。

ex: adj. 总统的；首长的；统辖的

wp.presidential system: 总统制;应更多的适用总裁制
wp.Presidential Commission: 爱尔兰总统委员会;总统委员会
wp.Presidential Villa: 总统别墅;总统别墅套房;海景豪华总统别墅;总统套房
wp.presidential government: 总统制;总统制政府;总统制政体

eg2: This scandal is bound to tell against him in the coming presidential election.
在即将到来的总统竞选中这一丑闻必然对他不利。

ex: n. 预言者
网络 占卜者

wp.fuel shortage: 燃料不足;燃料缺乏;燃料短缺;燃料的短缺
wp.capital shortage: 资金短缺;资金欠缺;资金缺乏
wp.dollar shortage: 美金缺乏;		美元荒;		美元短缺;美圆荒
wp.Shortage costs: 缺货损失费;缺货成本;短缺成本;缺货费用

ex: n. 缺乏，缺少；不足
eg2: Harry deserted during the food .
哈里在食物缺乏时逃亡了。
Another is a  of land and freshwater for use in aquaculture.
另一个障碍是用于水产养殖的土地和淡水资源不足。
This shift can be complex, expensive and there is no shortage of opponents to the change.
这种转变是复杂的、昂贵的，而且从来不缺少这种变革的反对者。

Title: The Democratic presidential field already looks crowded

paperStatistics.title: The Democratic presidential field already looks crowded
paperStatistics.desc: Beto O’Rourke becomes the latest declared candidate in a wide-open primary race
